statements: DELETE FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE painter_name = 'Leonardo da Vinci';
DELETE FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE painter_name = 'Leonardo da Vinci' AND status = 'In Progress';
DELETE FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE status = 'Pending' AND deadline < '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM painting_progress WHERE completion_date >= '2022-07-15' AND painting_id IN (SELECT painting_id FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE status = 'Completed');
DELETE FROM clients WHERE address = '123 Main St';
DELETE FROM artists WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE artist_name = 'Leonardo da Vinci' AND status = 'In Progress';
DELETE FROM painting_details WHERE canvas_size = '24x36' AND paint_type = 'Oil' AND color_palette = 'Warm colors';
